verses.verse: Shout<WH7321> for joy to Yahweh,<WH3068> all you lands!<WH776>
Serve<WH5647> Yahweh<WH3068> with gladness.<WH8057> Come<WH935> before his presence<WH6440> with singing.<WH7445>
Know<WH3045> that Yahweh,<WH3068> he is God.<WH430> It is he who has made<WH6213> us,<WH5971> and we are his. We are his people, and the sheep<WH6629> of his pasture.<WH4830>
Enter<WH935> into his gates<WH8179> with thanksgiving,<WH8426> into his courts<WH2691> with praise.<WH8416> Give thanks<WH3034> to him,<WH1288> and bless his name.<WH8034>
For Yahweh<WH3068> is good.<WH2896> His loving kindness<WH2896> endures forever,<WH5769> his faithfulness<WH530> to all<WH1755> generations.<WH1755>
